name: The Bloody Basketball
description:
The bloody basketball game is a terrifying game in which tells its story: a person wants to train for a basketball tournament, but in the middle of the training, terrifying and frightening things happen to him, and then the basketball suddenly disappears, so he goes to look for it, but a strange and terrifying person encounters him and tries to kill him, so she goes to a strange basement in order to He searches for the ball, and indeed he finds it, but when he leaves the basement, he sees that the door of his house is locked, and he needs a code in order to open the door of the house. After he opens the door, something strange happens to him.

If you can't find the door lock code, code

(6.8.7.9)
